thread.title: President Pranab Mukherjee returns Bihar Sugarcane Amendment Bill
thread.title_full: President Pranab Mukherjee returns Bihar Sugarcane Amendment Bill - The Financial Express

author: PTI
title: President Pranab Mukherjee returns Bihar Sugarcane Amendment Bill
text:
The Sugarcane Amendment Bill approved by the state Assembly in 2007 seeks to set up state Advisory Board to fix cane price on its own in place of that fixed by the Central government. (Reuters) President Pranab Mukherjee has directed to return the Bihar Sugarcane (Regulation of supply and purchase Amendment) Bill, 2007 to state Assembly for reconsideration. The President’s message in this regard was read out by Speaker Vijay Kumar Chaudhary in the House on the opening day of the budget session today.
The Sugarcane Amendment Bill approved by the state Assembly in 2007 seeks to set up state Advisory Board to fix cane price on its own in place of that fixed by the Central government.
“Having considered the Bill reserved for my consideration under provisions (Article 200 read with clause (2) of article 254) of the Constitution, I do hereby direct the Governor in pursuance of proviso the Article 201 of the Constitution that the Bill be returned to Legislative Assembly of Bihar with a message to reconsider it,” the President’s message said.
